entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries near midnight. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries or rain showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to a few rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
